annonsrubrik: Digital Talent Programme – IT Talent Agile, Project & DevOps
annonstext:
Climate change is one of the greatest challenges of humankind. A challenge that has completely come to define our work at Vattenfall. And we know that the future of energy will be formed by tomorrow’s talents. New digital innovations and solutions are vital to reach our goal: fossil free living within one generation.

By applying to the Digital Talent Programme 2021 you can become 1 of 12 talents working towards that goal. Each position in the programme is unique and has its own specific responsibilities and challenges.

Next to your personal development in this position, you will also be enjoying one year of all we have to offer. A year within this programme will include both virtual and live meet-ups with your international colleagues. During the year you will work on assignments virtually together, as well as participating in four seminar weeks during which you will meet live. Furthermore, you will have the opportunity to join a variety of trainings.

 

Your role as an IT Talent with Agile, Project & DevOps superpowers

You will be part of the Business Specific IT Distribution & Services department which provides business specific IT solutions for BU Distribution, Services and Heat.

Your daily activities

• Project Management assignments and / or supporting System Managers and Application Engineers, depending of your interest and career aspirations

• Support in Business and IT alignment

• Investigate and Develop Dev Ops way of working where applicable

Who are you?

You want to drive digital innovations and you are a firm believer of using your skills to tackle climate change. We believe you are a brilliant networker, a critical thinker, a resourceful innovator and a keen learner who always keeps an ear to the ground to catch up on developments.

As an IT Talent you recognize yourself in the following qualifications

• Self-driven, take initiative, flexible, energetic

• Cooperation, relation and to be service minded are key factors to you

• You have competence in Agile and Dev Ops and your technical interest is strong

You are our ideal talent if you are a recent graduate with an academic degree or a young professional with no more than three years of working experience. You are fluent in English and Swedish. Skills in other languages can be a merit. Furthermore, you are willing to relocate for possible assignments throughout the organization.

Location: Stockholm (Solna)

You will be working in department Business Specific IT Distribution & Services and the position is located in Stockholm, Sweden.

Our offer

The Digital Talent Programme is a kickstart to your career within Vattenfall. It will give you the opportunity to visit different parts of our organization, e.g. in Sweden, the Netherlands, Germany, and Poland. There are planned weeks including personal development and internal leadership development from our Vattenfall Management Institute. Furthermore, a hackathon, huddles and longer assignments will also be part of the programme. Each position comes with a competitive salary and an excellent remuneration package. Read more about the programme here https://careers.vattenfall.com/young-talents/digital-talent-programme/

Application process

We welcome your application in English, including resume and cover letter. Last day to apply is 4th of April 2021. Selection period starts in April, followed by online tests and interviews in April and May. The recruitment process will be finalized around the end of May. The last step will be a pre-employment screening. Starting date of the Digital Talent Programme will be 1st of September 2021.

Due to COVID-19 all steps of the recruitment process will take place virtual. At Vattenfall we are committed to acting responsibly in response to the challenges posed by COVID-19 and we are taking all necessary measures to protect employees and job applicants. For more questions about COVID-19, please visit our generic FAQ page on https://careers.vattenfall.com/about-us/frequently-asked-questions.

 

We look forward to your application! If you have any questions regarding the Talent Programme in general, please check our FAQ page on https://careers.vattenfall.com/frequently-asked-questions-digital-talent-programme/. For further information about the position, you are welcome to contact hiring manger FIRSTNAME LASTNAME,  EMAIL . If you have questions regarding the recruitment process you are welcome to contact responsible recruiter FIRSTNAME LASTNAME,  EMAIL .

Our organization

At Vattenfall you can free your superpowers! We are one of the European market leaders in the generation of renewable energy and are primarily active in Scandinavia, Germany, Denmark, UK and the Netherlands. We take our responsibility seriously and together we are making the change towards fossil freedom. Our goal is to enable a fossil-free living within one generation. We are a dynamic company with an international focus and a social face at the heart of society. Diversity and inclusion is in everything we do, read more about our work with diversity.

We are part of the Swedish critical infrastructure and many of our positions are security classed. This means that the final candidates might be subjected to a security vetting process in accordance with Swedish legislation.
